wp:term.wp:term_description: Recipient was mentioned in an activity update.
A member has replied to an activity update that the recipient posted.
A member has replied to a comment on an activity update that the recipient posted.
Recipient has registered for an account.
Recipient has registered for an account and site.
A member has sent a friend request to the recipient.
Recipient has had a friend request accepted by a member.
Recipient was mentioned in a group activity update.
A member has sent a group invitation to the recipient.
Recipient's status within a group has changed.
A member has requested permission to join a group.
Recipient had requested to join a group, which was accepted.
Recipient had requested to join a group, which was rejected.
Recipient has received a private message.
Recipient has changed their email address.

item.title: [{{{site.name}}}] {{poster.name}} replied to one of your updates
item.dc:creator: demo
item.content:encoded:
{{poster.name}} replied to one of your updates:
"{{usermessage}}"
Go to the discussion to reply or catch up on the conversation.

item.title: [{{{site.name}}}] {{poster.name}} replied to one of your comments
item.dc:creator: demo
item.content:encoded:
{{poster.name}} replied to one of your comments:
"{{usermessage}}"
Go to the discussion to reply or catch up on the conversation.

item.title: [{{{site.name}}}] {{poster.name}} mentioned you in a status update
item.dc:creator: demo
item.content:encoded:
{{poster.name}} mentioned you in a status update:
"{{usermessage}}"
Go to the discussion to reply or catch up on the conversation.

item.title: [{{{site.name}}}] {{poster.name}} mentioned you in an update
item.dc:creator: demo
item.content:encoded:
{{poster.name}} mentioned you in the group "{{group.name}}":
"{{usermessage}}"
Go to the discussion to reply or catch up on the conversation.

item.title: [{{{site.name}}}] Activate your account
item.dc:creator: demo
item.content:encoded: Thanks for registering! To complete the activation of your account, go to the following link: {{{activate.url}}}
item.excerpt:encoded:
Thanks for registering!
To complete the activation of your account, go to the following link: {{{activate.url}}}

item.title: [{{{site.name}}}] Activate {{{user-site.url}}}
item.dc:creator: demo
item.content:encoded: Thanks for registering! To complete the activation of your account and site, go to the following link: {{{activate-site.url}}}. After you activate, you can visit your site at {{{user-site.url}}}.

item.title: [{{{site.name}}}] New friendship request from {{initiator.name}}
item.dc:creator: demo
item.content:encoded: {{initiator.name}} wants to add you as a friend. To accept this request and manage all of your pending requests, visit: {{{friend-requests.url}}}

item.title: [{{{site.name}}}] {{friend.name}} accepted your friendship request
item.dc:creator: demo
item.excerpt:encoded:
{{friend.name}} accepted your friend request.
To learn more about them, visit their profile: {{{friendship.url}}}

item.title: [{{{site.name}}}] Group details updated
item.dc:creator: demo
item.content:encoded:
Group details for the group "{{group.name}}" were updated:
{{changed_text}}

item.title: [{{{site.name}}}] You have an invitation to the group: "{{group.name}}"
item.dc:creator: demo
item.content:encoded: {{inviter.name}} has invited you to join the group: "{{group.name}}". Go here to accept your invitation or visit the group to learn more.

item.title: [{{{site.name}}}] You have been promoted in the group: "{{group.name}}"
item.dc:creator: demo
item.content:encoded: You have been promoted to {{promoted_to}} in the group "{{group.name}}".
item.excerpt:encoded:
You have been promoted to {{promoted_to}} in the group: "{{group.name}}".
To visit the group, go to: {{{group.url}}}

item.title: [{{{site.name}}}] Membership request for group: {{group.name}}
item.dc:creator: demo
item.content:encoded: {{requesting-user.name}} wants to join the group "{{group.name}}". As you are an administrator of this group, you must either accept or reject the membership request. Go here to manage this and all other pending requests.

item.title: [{{{site.name}}}] New message from {{sender.name}}
item.dc:creator: demo

item.title: [{{{site.name}}}] Verify your new email address
item.dc:creator: demo
item.content:encoded: You recently changed the email address associated with your account on {{site.name}} to {{user.email}}. If this is correct, go here to confirm the change. Otherwise, you can safely ignore and delete this email if you have changed your mind, or if you think you have received this email in error.
item.excerpt:encoded:
You recently changed the email address associated with your account on {{site.name}} to {{user.email}}. If this is correct, go to the following link to confirm the change: {{{verify.url}}}
Otherwise, you can safely ignore and delete this email if you have changed your mind, or if you think you have received this email in error.

item.title: [{{{site.name}}}] Membership request for group "{{group.name}}" accepted
item.dc:creator: demo
item.content:encoded: Your membership request for the group "{{group.name}}" has been accepted.
item.excerpt:encoded:
Your membership request for the group "{{group.name}}" has been accepted.
To view the group, visit: {{{group.url}}}

item.title: [{{{site.name}}}] Membership request for group "{{group.name}}" rejected
item.dc:creator: demo
item.content:encoded: Your membership request for the group "{{group.name}}" has been rejected.
item.excerpt:encoded:
Your membership request for the group "{{group.name}}" has been rejected.
To request membership again, visit: {{{group.url}}}
